document.topic_text: Aug 22, 2016, 01.13 PM | Source: Moneycontrol.com MRPL's Q1 results on September 03, 2016 Mangalore Refinery and Petrochemicals Ltd has informed BSE that a Board Meeting of the Company has been scheduled for September 03, 2016 inter-alia to consider and approve Un-audited Financial Results for the quarter ended June 30, 2016 (Q1). MRPLs Q1 results on September 03, 2016 Mangalore Refinery and Petrochemicals Ltd has informed BSE that a Board Meeting of the Company has been scheduled for September 03, 2016 inter-alia to consider and approve Un-audited Financial Results for the quarter ended June 30, 2016 (Q1). Post Your Comments
